name: Fuerza Mágica Intergaláctica (Español - Argentina)
description:
This translation of Intergalactic Wizard Force was made for the LocJAM 2022 by Joaquín Legarreta and Manuela Yardin. 

We are super excited to take part this year and we hope you have as much fun as we did on this project!
